name: Keavy Elementary School
description: Public elementary school serving students in grades PK-5 in the Laurel County School District. Located in Keavy, Kentucky, this school provides comprehensive elementary education with a focus on academic achievement. The school offers breakfast and lunch programs, has a student-teacher ratio of 14:1, and serves approximately 298 students. Keavy Elementary is part of the Laurel County Public Schools system and provides transportation services for students.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Schools website and National Center for Education Statistics
hours_of_operation: School hours: 7:30 AM - 2:30 PM (Monday-Friday during school year)
eligibility_requirements: Students residing in the Keavy Elementary attendance zone in Laurel County
accessibility: Public school accessible to all eligible students
notes: Part of Laurel County School District. School serves grades PK-5 with approximately 298 students. Fax: (606) 878-6825. School has active PTO and community involvement.
